response.original_title: Global Destination: Passport to the World
response.overview: Experience the excitement of an exotic getaway without leaving the comforts of home with this virtual video passport that blends breathtaking vistas of the Orient with modern music designed to stimulate your senses. The program's rotating gallery of images snapped in India and other Far East hot spots can be used either for pure relaxation and stress relief or as inspiration for your next vacation.
response.title: Global Destination: Passport to the World
